how_are_you: I'm just a bot, but I'm here to help! 🤖
what_is_your_name: My name is ChatBot! What's yours? 😄
what_can_you_do: I can assist with any questions you have! 🤔
thank_you: You're welcome! 🙌 Let me know if you need anything. 😊
bye: Goodbye! 👋 Take care and see you soon! 💫
love: Love ❤️ is the most beautiful thing in the world 🌎.
help: How can I assist you today? 🤗
name: My name is ChatBot! 😊
how: How can I help you today? 🤔
where: Where do you want to go? 🌍
when: I'm here whenever you need me! ⏰
no: Sorry, I didn't quite catch that. 😅
please: Sure, what can I do for you? 🤗
good_morning: Good morning! 🌞 Hope you have a fantastic day ahead! 🌸
good_night: Good night! 😴 Sweet dreams and sleep well! 💤
welcome: Welcome! 👏 How can I help you today? 😊
sad: I’m sorry to hear that 😔. How can I help? 💙
excited: I can feel your excitement! 😆 What’s going on? 🔥
bored: Feeling bored? 😐 Let's do something fun! 😜
tired: Take a rest, you deserve it! 🛌😴
hungry: What do you feel like eating? 🍕🍔🍣
lost: Don’t worry, I’ll help you find your way! 🧭
cold: Stay warm! 🧣🧤 Maybe a hot drink will help! ☕
hot: Stay cool! 😎 Drink lots of water! 💦
funny: Haha, that’s hilarious! 😂 Keep them coming! 😄
joke: Why don’t skeletons fight each other? 🦴 They don’t have the guts! 😆
sad: I’m here for you! 🫶 Let me know how I can help. 💙
angry: I can feel your frustration. 😤 Want to talk about it? 🗣️
calm: Take a deep breath. 🧘‍♂️ Everything will be okay. 🌿
sleepy: It’s nap time! 💤 Get some rest and recharge! 🌙
exhausted: Take it easy, you’ve been working hard! 💪😌
stressed: Let’s take a moment to relax. 🧘‍♀️ You’ve got this! 💫
cheer_up: Everything will be alright! 😊 Let’s make the day better! 🌞
great_job: You’re doing amazing! 🌟 Keep it up! 💯
keep_going: Don’t stop now! 💪 You’re so close! 🚀
good_effort: You’ve put in great effort! 🙌 Keep going! 💥
you_can_do_it: I believe in you! 💖 You can do anything! 💪
never_give_up: Keep pushing forward! 💪 You’re almost there! 🚀
believe_in_yourself: You are capable of amazing things! 🌟 Believe in yourself! 💫
be_positive: Stay positive, and good things will come! ✨
you_got_this: You absolutely got this! 💯 Let’s do it! 🚀
positive_vibes: Sending you positive vibes! ✨ Stay strong! 💪
stay_positive: Keep your head up and stay positive! 🌈
stay_focused: Focus on your goals! 🎯 You’ll reach them! 🌟
you_are_unique: You are one of a kind! 🌟 Embrace it! 💖
embrace_the_day: Embrace today with open arms! 🌞 Make it count! 💯
be_kind: Kindness is always the answer! 💕 Spread the love! 🌸
be_yourself: Be yourself! 🌟 You’re amazing just the way you are! 💖
trust_the_process: Trust the process. 💪 Everything will fall into place! 🌟
keep_smiling: Keep smiling! 😊 It makes everything better! 💖
stay_happy: Stay happy and spread that joy! 😄🌈
take_it_easy: Take it easy! 🧘‍♀️ Everything will be okay! 🌻
enjoy_the_moment: Enjoy the moment! 🌸 Life is beautiful! 🌟
have_a_great_day: Have a fantastic day ahead! 🌞 You deserve it! 💖
make_it_count: Make every moment count! ⏳ Live fully! 🌈
you_are_enough: You are enough just as you are! 💖 Believe in yourself! 🌟
appreciate_yourself: Take a moment to appreciate everything you’ve done! 🌸💖
stay_healthy: Health is wealth! 🥦💪 Take care of yourself! 💖
rest_well: Rest well, recharge, and wake up refreshed! 🛏️✨
refresh_yourself: Take a break and refresh your mind! 🌱🧘‍♂️
take_care: Take care of yourself and those around you! 💖
never_stop_dreaming: Dream big and never stop chasing your dreams! 💭✨
be_brave: Be brave in everything you do! 💪 You are unstoppable! 🚀
huzuni: Pole kwa huzuni. Niko hapa kwa ajili yako. 💙
ndoto: Endelea kuota na kufuata ndoto zako! 💭
maisha: Maisha ni safari, furahiya kila hatua! 🌱
rafiki: Rafiki bora ni zawadi ya maisha! 🤝
ndoa: Ndoa ni zawadi kubwa kutoka kwa Mungu! 💍
nguvu: Nina nguvu ya kufanya kila kitu! 💪
wenyeji: Wenyeji wa hapa ni wazuri sana! 🏡
sehemu: Hii ni sehemu bora kwa biashara yako! 💼
dhidi: Dhidi ya ugumu, hatufai kukata tamaa! 💪
utajiri: Utajiri ni tofauti kwa kila mtu! 💰
mchana: Habari ya mchana, furahiya kila dakika! 🌞
usafiri: Twende safari, ni wakati wa kujivinjari! 🚗
michezo: Michezo ni burudani kwa watu wote! ⚽
kuelewa: Kuelewa ni ufunguo wa kumaliza matatizo! 🧠
